invocations.description: Same as function print, but the messages will be printed with color 'red' and the console will pop-up once you call this function.
invocations.ex:
auto(200, 300)
if not $connected then
	printerror('Your character is disconnected')
	auto(0)
end
invocations.exDescription: If you are not connected to the game, it will pop-up the console and print a message saying that you got disconnected and then disable the script.
